title: SEAT SURRENDER QUERY AM I COOKED
content:
I got admitted during round 1, submitted original documents too. 

Despite that can I still surrender my seat till 25th July and retrieve my original docs? 

Additionally if you have some info about the process for "letter to vice chancellor" do let me know.

Thanks üôè

comments.body:
Yeah you can take back your documents

When i asked the staff there if there is any template we need to follow to get back documents if needed
They just said to write a formal letter and submit it 
you will have to go to the admin office of the doreswamy block or something
The one with the big golden globe in front of it
